channel.title: Sql Browser Service on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Sql Browser Service on 0x000216

item.title: Understanding and Embracing the SQL Server Browser Service
item.description: I previously discussed some difficulties I encountered logging into GP because the SQL Server Browser service wasn’t running. I want to explain the background of the SQL Server Browser service and why it should be running on a Dynamics GP SQL 2005 server. In the past, SQL Server 7.5 only permitted one instance per machine, listening for connections on port 1433. This simplicity had a drawback: only one instance was allowed.
